items.title: Americans missed out on a ‘once-in-a-lifetime’ chance to buy a house—the 3 shifts it would take to make housing affordable are ‘very unlikely’
items.description: “We see the housing market remaining relatively stuck without major progress being made on affordability,” home construction CEO says.

items.title: RFK Jr.  is pushing Americans to eat more red meat and dairy as Starbucks, Chipotle, and others cash in on protein craze
items.description: Americans want more protein in their diets, and brands have been happy to oblige.

items.title: Trump’s Greenland takeover would require ‘billions upon billions’ spent over decades to acquire a mineral industry that doesn’t yet exist, experts say
items.description: As the White House confirms military force is "always an option," experts say the costs—financial, strategic, and geopolitical—will be staggering.

items.title: Jensen Huang might be fine with a billionaires tax, but Google cofounder Larry Page is already dumping California
items.description: Page converted several of his assets out of California before the end of 2025, according to state filings.

items.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Health in a push to become a hub for personal health data
